mapper.select: select f.favorite_name,f.id as id,count(f.book_id) as mcount from (select w.*,m.book_id from writer_book_favorite w left join book_user_mark m on w.id=m.favorite_id) f GROUP BY f.favorite_name

select b.author,b.bookname,b.clicks,b.comments,b.likes,b.bookmarks,d.detail from book_user_mark m LEFT JOIN book b on m.book_id=b.id LEFT JOIN book_detail d on b.id=d.book_id where m.favorite_id=#{favoriteId}
